list.name: Libra
list.desc: A beginner-friendly open-source ML library in Python which allows you to build powerful models in one-liners.

list.name: Aquedeuct
list.desc: A multithreaded TCP/IP server implemented in C

list.name: Food Frenzy
list.desc: A tool to help users decide where to eat based on geolocation and Yelp reviews of dining options

list.name: Graph-Based Approaches to Natural Language Processing
list.desc: Benchmarked the constraints of representing NLP datasets as graphs and contributed to an EMNLP accepted research paper

list.name: Unsupervised Textual Learning
list.desc: Gained investment insight about public sentiment by clustering >1 million articles of web-scraped financial news
